****************************************************************** Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Issue Reported: {!Case.Description}
Hello,
We wanted to send an update on the issue that you had recently reported. The issue with a Payment Gateway Test Mode notification being displayed in your control panel and/or on invoice emails has been resolved.
If you continue to see this issue, please contact our support team and reference BIG-25189 so that we can resolve the issue for you manually. Our apologies for any inconvenience and we appreciate your patience while we resolved the issue.
Please don't hesitate to contact us if you have further questions. Technical support is available 24/7:
BigCommerce Support http://support.bigcommerce.com
